thread.title: Rise - Danny Gokey

title: Rise - Danny Gokey
text: Born: April 24, 1980 in Milwaukee, WI Genre: Pop Years Active: '00s, '10s Although he largely stuck to gospel and soul music during his time on American Idol, Danny Gokey transformed himself into a country artist following the show's conclusion. Born on April 24, 1980, in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, he was raised in a large family and began singing during weekly church services. Gokey's interest in religion and music continued to shape his adolescence, and he became the music director of Faith Builders International Ministries during his mid-twenties. Meanwhile, he married his...   Danny Gokey 1.
